{"id":1145552798,"question_id":3245,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1705201214,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1890 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1145552798/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Beautiful Indices in the Given Array I","memory":"45.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<Integer> beautifulIndices(String s, String a, String b, int k) {\n        \n        List<Integer> list=  new ArrayList<>();\n//         for(int i=0; i<s.length()-a.lenght(); i++){\n            \n//             boolean match = true;\n//             for(int ai=0; ai<a.length();ai++){\n//                 if(s.charAt(i+a)!=a.charAt(ai)){\n//                     match=false;\n//                     break;\n//                 }\n//             }\n//             if(!match) continue;\n            \n//             for(int bi=0; bi<b.length(); bi++){\n                \n//             }\n//         }\n//         String abcb = \"abcb\";\n//         System.out.println(abcb.indexOf(\"b\", 1+1));\n        \n        int ia= s.indexOf(a);\n        \n        while(ia!=-1 ){\n            \n            \n            int ib = s.indexOf(b);\n            while(ib!=-1){\n                \n                // System.out.println(ia+ \" \" + ib); \n                \n                if(Math.abs(ia-ib)<=k){\n                    list.add(ia);\n                    ia = s.indexOf(a, ia+1);\n                    break;\n\n                }else{\n\n                    ib= s.indexOf(b, ib+1);\n                   \n                }\n                \n                \n            }\n            \n             if(ib==-1){\n                 ia = s.indexOf(a, ia+1);\n             }\n\n            \n            \n           \n            \n        }\n        return list;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-beautiful-indices-in-the-given-array-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
